language.welcomeTitle: Welcome to the Intel(R) Wireless Bluetooth(R) Device Installer!
language.welcomeIntro: This wizard will help you install the driver software that makes your Bluetooth devices work.
language.installHeaderTitle: Installing the Software for your Bluetooth Device...
language.eulaYesButton: I &accept the terms in the License Agreement
language.eulaNoButton: I do n&ot accept the terms in the License Agreement
language.finishTitle: Completing the Device Driver Installation Wizard
language.finishText: Congratulations! You are finished installing your Bluetooth (R) device drivers.
